Header: Public Help Sought to Trace One More Killer Suspect
Content: Police Headquarters requests the general public to help the Police to trace the whereabouts of the suspect, sketched out below in connection with the Easter Sunday killings. Any information as regards the suspect can be communicated to the Police through Tel Nos 011-2422176 / 011-2392900 , according to the Police Spokesman SP Ruwan Gunasekara.
